column4: I can play WMV video just fine but the audio does not play. I have VLC installed but still no audio. I'm sure there is an answer in the forums but I can't seem to find it... does anybody have a thought?
Do you have the media codecs installed?
I don't know how to troubleshoot sound, but I would check to make sure you have the codecs downloaded
I tried to install w32codecs but those don't exist in repo anymore... is there another package? (other than what attempts to install automatically)
You have to add the medibuntu repo
ah, okay. I'll look for that
I would install ubuntu-restricted-extras as well
I'm think I already have that repo
Nah, if you did it would have installed the codecs .. unless you are putting it in wrong or dont have the key
no good, still no audio.. oh well
You said it works for other media? The audio
Were you able to install the w32codecs?
yeah, I installed that package. Earlier I thought you were referring to the restricted repo...
hmmm.. perhaps its the media itself?
maybe. It's just a video from IGN that I wanted to watch.
